description: To address the critical elevation of privilege vulnerability identified as CVE-2023-36036 affecting Microsoft Windows 10 and later, Microsoft recommends updating your systems immediately. This vulnerability, which has a CVSS score of 7.8, allows local access exploitation to gain system-level privileges. As this flaw is actively being exploited in ongoing attacks, applying the recommended updates is crucial to prevent unauthorized privilege escalation. Ensure that systems running on Windows Server 2008 and subsequent releases are prioritized for this patch to mitigate potential threats effectively. The urgency of this update is significant given the simplicity of the attack method and the current exploitation risks.
